00020 #ifndef _XENO_NUCLEUS_THREAD_H
00021 #define _XENO_NUCLEUS_THREAD_H
00022 
00023 #include <nucleus/timer.h>
00024 
00025 /* Status flags */
00026 #define XNSUSP    0x00000001    /* Suspended */
00027 #define XNPEND    0x00000002    /* Sleep-wait for a resource */
00028 #define XNDELAY   0x00000004    /* Delayed */
00029 #define XNREADY   0x00000008    /* Linked to the ready queue */
00030 #define XNDORMANT 0x00000010    /* Not started yet or killed */
00031 #define XNZOMBIE  0x00000020    /* Zombie thread in deletion process */
00032 #define XNRESTART 0x00000040    /* Restarting thread */
00033 #define XNSTARTED 0x00000080    /* Could be restarted */
00034 #define XNRELAX   0x00000100    /* Relaxed shadow thread (blocking bit) */
00035 
00036 #define XNTIMEO   0x00000200    /* Woken up due to a timeout condition */
00037 #define XNRMID    0x00000400    /* Pending on a removed resource */
00038 #define XNBREAK   0x00000800    /* Forcibly awaken from a wait state */
00039 #define XNKICKED  0x00001000    /* Kicked upon signal (shadow only) */
00040 #define XNBOOST   0x00002000    /* Undergoes regular PIP boost */
00041 #define XNDEBUG   0x00004000    /* Hit debugger breakpoint (shadow only) */
00042 
00043 /* Mode flags. */
00044 #define XNLOCK    0x00008000    /* Not preemptible */
00045 #define XNRRB     0x00010000    /* Undergoes a round-robin scheduling */
00046 #define XNASDI    0x00020000    /* ASR are disabled */
00047 #define XNSHIELD  0x00040000    /* IRQ shield is enabled (shadow only) */
00048 #define XNTRAPSW  0x00080000    /* Trap execution mode switches */
00049 
00050 #define XNFPU     0x00100000    /* Thread uses FPU */
00051 #define XNSHADOW  0x00200000    /* Shadow thread */
00052 #define XNROOT    0x00400000    /* Root thread (i.e. Linux/IDLE) */
00053 #define XNINVPS   0x00800000    /* Using inverted priority scale */
00054 
00055 /*
00056   Must follow the declaration order of the above bits. Status symbols
00057   are defined as follows:
00058   'S' -> Forcibly suspended.
00059   'w'/'W' -> Waiting for a resource, with or without timeout.
00060   'D' -> Delayed (without any other wait condition).
00061   'R' -> Runnable.
00062   'U' -> Unstarted or dormant.
00063   'X' -> Relaxed shadow.
00064   'b' -> Priority boost undergoing.
00065   'T' -> Ptraced and stopped.
00066   'l' -> Locks scheduler.
00067   'r' -> Undergoes round-robin .
00068   's' -> Interrupt shield enabled.
00069   't' -> Mode switches trapped.
00070   'f' -> FPU enabled (for kernel threads).
00071 */
00072 #define XNTHREAD_SLABEL_INIT { \
00073   'S', 'W', 'D', 'R', 'U', \
00074   '.', '.', '.', 'X', '.', \
00075   '.', '.', '.', 'b', 'T', \
00076   'l', 'r', '.', 's', 't', \
00077   'f', '.', '.', '.'       \
00078 }
00079 
00080 #define XNTHREAD_BLOCK_BITS   (XNSUSP|XNPEND|XNDELAY|XNDORMANT|XNRELAX)
00081 #define XNTHREAD_MODE_BITS    (XNLOCK|XNRRB|XNASDI|XNSHIELD|XNTRAPSW)
00082 
00083 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00084 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE0  0x10000000
00085 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE1  0x20000000
00086 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE2  0x40000000
00087 #define XNTHREAD_SPARE3  0x80000000
00088 #define XNTHREAD_SPARES  0xf0000000
00089 
00090 #if defined(__KERNEL__) || defined(__XENO_UVM__) || defined(__XENO_SIM__)
00091 
00092 #ifdef __XENO_SIM__
00093 /* Pseudo-status (must not conflict with other bits) */
00094 #define XNRUNNING  XNTHREAD_SPARE0
00095 #define XNDELETED  XNTHREAD_SPARE1
00096 #endif /* __XENO_SIM__ */
00097 
00098 #define XNTHREAD_INVALID_ASR  ((void (*)(xnsigmask_t))0)
00099 
00100 struct xnsched;
00101 struct xnsynch;
00102 
00103 typedef void (*xnasr_t)(xnsigmask_t sigs);
00104 
00105 typedef struct xnthread {
00106 
00107     xnarchtcb_t tcb;            /* Architecture-dependent block -- Must be first */
00108 
00109     xnflags_t status;           /* Thread status flags */
00110 
00111     struct xnsched *sched;      /* Thread scheduler */
00112 
00113     xnarch_cpumask_t affinity;  /* Processor affinity. */
00114 
00115     int bprio;                  /* Base priority (before PIP boost) */
00116 
00117     int cprio;                  /* Current priority */
00118 
00119     xnpholder_t rlink;          /* Thread holder in ready queue */
00120 
00121     xnpholder_t plink;          /* Thread holder in synchronization queue(s) */
00122 
00123     xnholder_t glink;           /* Thread holder in global queue */
00124 
00125 /* We don't want side-effects on laddr here! */
00126 #define link2thread(laddr,link) \
00127 ((xnthread_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnthread_t *)0)->link)))
00128 
00129     xnpqueue_t claimq;          /* Owned resources claimed by others (PIP) */
00130 
00131     struct xnsynch *wchan;      /* Resource the thread pends on */
00132 
00133     xntimer_t rtimer;           /* Resource timer */
00134 
00135     xntimer_t ptimer;           /* Periodic timer */
00136 
00137     xnticks_t pexpect;          /* Date of next periodic release point (raw ticks). */
00138 
00139     xnsigmask_t signals;        /* Pending signals */
00140 
00141     xnticks_t rrperiod;         /* Allotted round-robin period (ticks) */
00142 
00143     xnticks_t rrcredit;         /* Remaining round-robin time credit (ticks) */
00144 
00145 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00146     struct {
00147         unsigned long psw;      /* Primary mode switch count */
00148         unsigned long ssw;      /* Secondary mode switch count */
00149         unsigned long csw;      /* Context switches (includes
00150                                    secondary -> primary switches) */
00151         unsigned long pf;       /* Number of page faults */
00152     } stat;
00153 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */
00154 
00155     int errcode;                /* Local errno */
00156 
00157     xnasr_t asr;                /* Asynchronous service routine */
00158 
00159     xnflags_t asrmode;          /* Thread's mode for ASR */
00160 
00161     int asrimask;               /* Thread's interrupt mask for ASR */
00162 
00163     unsigned asrlevel;          /* ASR execution level (ASRs are reentrant) */
00164 
00165     int imask;                  /* Initial interrupt mask */
00166 
00167     int imode;                  /* Initial mode */
00168 
00169     int iprio;                  /* Initial priority */
00170 
00171 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_REGISTRY
00172     struct {
00173         xnhandle_t handle;      /* Handle in registry */
00174         const char *waitkey;    /* Pended key */
00175     } registry;
00176 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_REGISTRY */
00177 
00178     unsigned magic;             /* Skin magic. */
00179 
00180     char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* Symbolic name of thread */
00181 
00182     xnticks_t stime;            /* Start time */
00183 
00184     void (*entry)(void *cookie); /* Thread entry routine */
00185 
00186     void *cookie;               /* Cookie to pass to the entry routine */
00187 
00188     void *extinfo;              /* Extended information -- user-defined */
00189 
00190     XNARCH_DECL_DISPLAY_CONTEXT();
00191 
00192 } xnthread_t;
00193 
00194 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_START  1
00195 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_SWITCH 2
00196 #define XNHOOK_THREAD_DELETE 3
00197 
00198 typedef struct xnhook {
00199 
00200     xnholder_t link;
00201 
00202 #define link2hook(laddr) \
00203 ((xnhook_t *)(((char *)laddr) - (int)(&((xnhook_t *)0)->link)))
00204 
00205     void (*routine)(xnthread_t *thread);
00206 
00207 } xnhook_t;
00208 
00209 #define xnthread_name(thread)              ((thread)->name)
00210 #define xnthread_clear_name(thread)        do { *(thread)->name = 0; } while(0)
00211 #define xnthread_sched(thread)             ((thread)->sched)
00212 #define xnthread_start_time(thread)        ((thread)->stime)
00213 #define xnthread_status_flags(thread)      ((thread)->status)
00214 #define xnthread_test_flags(thread,flags)  testbits((thread)->status,flags)
00215 #define xnthread_set_flags(thread,flags)   __setbits((thread)->status,flags)
00216 #define xnthread_clear_flags(thread,flags) __clrbits((thread)->status,flags)
00217 #define xnthread_initial_priority(thread)  ((thread)->iprio)
00218 #define xnthread_base_priority(thread)     ((thread)->bprio)
00219 #define xnthread_current_priority(thread)  ((thread)->cprio)
00220 #define xnthread_time_slice(thread)        ((thread)->rrperiod)
00221 #define xnthread_time_credit(thread)       ((thread)->rrcredit)
00222 #define xnthread_archtcb(thread)           (&((thread)->tcb))
00223 #define xnthread_asr_level(thread)         ((thread)->asrlevel)
00224 #define xnthread_pending_signals(thread)   ((thread)->signals)
00225 #define xnthread_timeout(thread)           xntimer_get_timeout(&(thread)->rtimer)
00226 #define xnthread_stack_size(thread)        xnarch_stack_size(xnthread_archtcb(thread))
00227 #define xnthread_extended_info(thread)     ((thread)->extinfo)
00228 #define xnthread_handle(thread)            ((thread)->registry.handle)
00229 #define xnthread_set_magic(thread,m)       do { (thread)->magic = (m); } while(0)
00230 #define xnthread_get_magic(thread)         ((thread)->magic)
00231 #define xnthread_signaled_p(thread)        ((thread)->signals != 0)
00232 #define xnthread_user_task(thread)         xnarch_user_task(xnthread_archtcb(thread))
00233 #define xnthread_user_pid(thread) \
00234     (testbits((thread)->status,XNROOT) || !xnthread_user_task(thread) ? \
00235     0 : xnarch_user_pid(xnthread_archtcb(thread)))
00236 
00237 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS
00238 #define xnthread_inc_psw(thread)     ++(thread)->stat.psw
00239 #define xnthread_inc_ssw(thread)     ++(thread)->stat.ssw
00240 #define xnthread_inc_csw(thread)     ++(thread)->stat.csw
00241 #define xnthread_inc_pf(thread)      ++(thread)->stat.pf
00242 #else /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */
00243 #define xnthread_inc_psw(thread)     do { } while(0)
00244 #define xnthread_inc_ssw(thread)     do { } while(0)
00245 #define xnthread_inc_csw(thread)     do { } while(0)
00246 #define xnthread_inc_pf(thread)      do { } while(0)
00247 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_STATS */

00253 int xnthread_init(xnthread_t *thread,
00254                   const char *name,
00255                   int prio,
00256                   xnflags_t flags,
00257                   unsigned stacksize);
00258 
00259 void xnthread_cleanup_tcb(xnthread_t *thread);

00261 char *xnthread_symbolic_status(xnflags_t status, char *buf, int size);

00263 int *xnthread_get_errno_location(void);
00264 
00265 static inline xnticks_t xnthread_get_timeout(xnthread_t *thread, xnticks_t now)
00266 {
00267     xnticks_t timeout;
00268 
00269     if (!testbits(thread->status,XNDELAY))
00270         return 0LL;
00271 
00272     timeout = (xntimer_get_date(&thread->rtimer) ? : xntimer_get_date(&thread->ptimer));
00273 
00274     if (timeout <= now)
00275         return 1;
00276 
00277     return timeout - now;
00278 }
00279 
00280 #ifdef __cplusplus
00281 }
00282 #endif
00283 
00284 #endif /* __KERNEL__ || __XENO_UVM__ || __XENO_SIM__ */
